body:
I am using Ruby 1.8, so there is no easy way to know where a method is declared. The function source_location doesn't exist.

So I used rubynode from http://rubynode.rubyforge.org/ to get the source code of the function if the method is already declared.

For the slice function I get:
["scope",{"next":["block",[["args",{"cnt":0,"rest":["lasgn",{"cnt":2,"value":false,"vid":"keep_keys"}],"opt":false}],["lasgn",{"cnt":3,"value":["hash",{"head":false}],"vid":"h"}],["iter",{"body":["attrasgn",{"recv":["lvar",{"cnt":3,"vid":"h"}],"mid":"[]=","args":["array",[["dvar",{"vid":"key"}],["fcall",{"mid":"fetch","args":["array",[["dvar",{"vid":"key"}]]]}]]]}],"iter":["call",{"recv":["lvar",{"cnt":2,"vid":"keep_keys"}],"mid":"each","args":false}],"var":["dasgn_curr",{"value":false,"vid":"key"}]}],["lvar",{"cnt":3,"vid":"h"}]]],"rval":["cref",{"clss":"Hash","next":["cref",{"clss":"Object","next":false}]}],"tbl":["keep_keys","h"]}]
That's the description of the function slice for Hash class in the i18n project.

For the except function I get:
["scope",{"next":["block",[["args",{"cnt":0,"rest":["lasgn",{"cnt":2,"value":false,"vid":"less_keys"}],"opt":false}],["fcall",{"mid":"slice","args":["splat",{"head":["call",{"recv":["vcall",{"mid":"keys"}],"mid":"-","args":["array",[["lvar",{"cnt":2,"vid":"less_keys"}]]]}]}]}]]],"rval":["cref",{"clss":"Hash","next":["cref",{"clss":"Object","next":false}]}],"tbl":["less_keys"]}]
That's the description of the function except for Hash class in the i18n project.

For the deep_merge! function I get:
["scope",{"next":["block",[["args",{"cnt":1,"rest":false,"opt":false}],["block_pass",{"body":["const",{"vid":"MERGER"}],"iter":["fcall",{"mid":"merge!","args":["array",[["lvar",{"cnt":2,"vid":"data"}]]]}]}]]],"rval":["cref",{"clss":{},"next":["cref",{"clss":{"parent_name":null},"next":false}]}],"tbl":["data"]}]
That's the description of the function deep_merge! for Hash class in the i18n project.

So I am sure that's method slice, deep_merge and except warnings source is not a double file require, but a method redefined from i18n project.

Thanks
